data.name: Paloma Rossi Becca Ankle Boots
data.notes: Meet Becca, your go-to women’s boots from Paloma Rossi. These block-heeled beauties feature croc-embossed detailing across the buckled strap, and a handy inner zip for on-the go wear.

data.name: Sakura Brixton Boots
data.notes: Meet Becca, your go-to women’s boots from Paloma Rossi. These block-heeled beauties feature croc-embossed detailing across the buckled strap, and a handy inner zip for on-the go wear.

data.name: Cilantro Ankle Boots - Wide Fit
data.notes: Unlike the herb, our Cilantro boots will have everyone on the same page, because what's not to love about this chunky style!

data.name: Sakura Seville Ankle Boots
data.notes: The Sakura Seville Ankle Boots are a stunning staple this season. Featuring a low block heel and a white outer sole design for a polished every day look.!
